channel.title: Comments on: MY BEIJING WEEK
channel.description: Won't you join me for a crazy crazy China adventure?

item.title: by: MichaelWilliams
item.description: Your sharing your adventures is really appreciated by us, the homebound. There are four of us now so HI from Heather, Sarah, Reid and Me.
item.content:encoded: Your sharing your adventures is really appreciated by us, the homebound. There are four of us now so HI from Heather, Sarah, Reid and Me.

item.title: by: elenore
item.description:
last time i talked to you was right around this edition or the blog it was neat getting to read all about what you were telling me on the phone missing you -elenore
Did you and hyot really see dreamgirls?? that is too funny
item.content:encoded:
last time i talked to you was right around this edition or the blog it was neat getting to read all about what you were telling me on the phone
missing you
-elenore

Did you and hyot really see dreamgirls?? that is too funny

item.title: by: marcus
item.description: I like the part about you sitting on the bench. thinking about high school.
item.content:encoded: I like the part about you sitting on the bench. thinking about high school.

item.title: by: Jane
item.description:
Yes,I want to ask either,"How long did you write this article?"You really did a very good and hard job,and I am so pride of you! Will,you are so great and wonderful...
Pukie
item.content:encoded:
Yes,I want to ask either,”How long did you write this article?”You really did a very good and hard job,and I am so pride of you!
Will,you are so great and wonderful…

Pukie

item.title: by: Will
item.description: I am glad you love how long it is, it did take me a while, I didn't want to leave any of the cool stuff out. I have very few things to do these days. I saw the episode where Andrew Zimmern went to Japan and made mention of but did not consume a glass of wine with a deer penis. I have seen wine with whole snakes here though. Haven't tried it yet. w
item.content:encoded:
I am glad you love how long it is, it did take me a while, I didn’t want to leave any of the cool stuff out. I have very few things to do these days. I saw the episode where Andrew Zimmern went to Japan and made mention of but did not consume a glass of wine with a deer penis. I have seen wine with whole snakes here though. Haven’t tried it yet.
w

item.title: by: amybugg
item.description: Will--this took me forever to read (which I love, by the way)...but I can't even imagine how long it took you to write! Now you are my own personal Andrew Zimmern (the guy I TIVO who eats weird stuff all over the world)! Your visit sounds amazing...I think it is rad that you got to walk around on the Great Wall. Just call me uber-jealous.
item.content:encoded: Will–this took me forever to read (which I love, by the way)…but I can’t even imagine how long it took you to write! Now you are my own personal Andrew Zimmern (the guy I TIVO who eats weird stuff all over the world)! Your visit sounds amazing…I think it is rad that you got to walk around on the Great Wall. Just call me uber-jealous.
